verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> of degrees.<WH4609> They that trust<WH982> in the LORD<WH3068> shall be as mount<WH2022> Zion,<WH6726> which cannot<WH3808> be removed,<WH4131> but abideth<WH3427> forever.<WH5769>
As the mountains<WH2022> are round about<WH5439> Jerusalem,<WH3389> so the LORD<WH3068> is round about<WH5439> his people<WH5971> from henceforth<WH4480> <WH6258> even forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>

For <WH3588> the rod<WH7626> of the wicked<WH7562> shall not<WH3808> rest<WH5117> upon<WH5921> the lot<WH1486> of the righteous;<WH6662> lest<WH4616> <WH3808> the righteous<WH6662> put forth<WH7971> their hands<WH3027> unto iniquity.<WH5766>
Do good,<WH3190> O LORD,<WH3068> unto those that be good,<WH2896> and to them that are upright<WH3477> in their hearts.<WH3826>

As for such as turn aside<WH5186> unto their crooked ways,<WH6128> the LORD<WH3068> shall lead them forth<WH1980> with<WH854> the workers<WH6466> of iniquity:<WH205> but peace<WH7965> shall be upon<WH5921> Israel.<WH3478>
